description:
Building a castle in Sunomata starts to go pretty well for Hideyoshi. However, they are then attacked by Saito’s forces. Since Hideyoshi and the others spent the last three nights trying to build this castle with no rest, they are put in a difficult situation...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fais comme si on l’avait construit en une nuit
Ichiya de Kizuita Koto ni Shitoi!!
Let`s Just Say It Got Built Overnight!!
一夜で築いた事にしとい!!
